thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Kristof

author: Kristof
title: Kristof
text: I first ordered from Banggood about a year ago and it quickly became my favorite online store. Prices are great, quality of their items is decent (if you avoid suspiciously cheap things) and most importantly their customer care is extraordinary! Within several dozens of my orders, I had few quality issues (item damaged during shipping, malfunctional product...) and in EVRY SINGLE time, I received refund in prompt. Their communication is fast and positive. Really, I couldn't be more sattisfied.
